# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[this]]; this one

====Usage notes====
* {{zh-l|個|go3}} is a classifier. Use {{l|zh|呢}} + ''classifier'' for words that have classifiers. For example, if one were to say "this pair of pants", it would be
:: {{zh-x|呢{ni1} '''條''' 褲|this '''pair''' of pants|C}}
: and not
:: {{zh-x|@* 呢{ni1} '''個''' 褲|*this '''[one]''' pants|C}}
: or
:: {{zh-x|@* 呢{ni1} '''個''' '''條''' 褲|*this '''[one] pair''' pants|C}}

* {{zh-l|咿個}}, {{zh-l|伊個|tr=ji1 go3}}
